availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Adair County native. Married to Catherine Smith Caldwell. Father of Isaac Palmer Caldwell. Graduated Georgetown College in 1844. Studied law under Judge Zachariah Wheat and practiced with him until 1851. Practiced in partnership with George Alfred Caldwell from 1851 to 1866. Third President of the University of Louisville.

bibl.p: H. Levin, Lawyers and Lawmakers of Kentucky (Chicago: Lewis Publishing Company, 1897) 186-88. "Issac Caldwell" in The Encyclopedia of Louisville, John E. Kleber, ed. (Lexington: University Press of Kentucky, 2001), 155.
